title: TODO list- Your daily action reminder
description: I've developed an online web platform using React.js where you can create, edit, upload, and delete your to-do lists securely and privately, ensuring a disturbance-free experience.

title: APOD PROJECT – API based react WebApp
description: Developed a flexible web app using NASA's API to fetch and display Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD) data, dynamically rendered through props and state in a React.js framework.

title: WoolWeb – OR Scanner & Generator
description: This project aims to learn the programming languages by building an app that can generate and scan QR codes for real-time information and shows the usage of modern technologies.

title: GYM web application
description: This project aims to learn programming languages by creating an gym app that provides exercise details and tracks progress, showcasing the use of modern technologies.

title: SD Industry webpage
description: This project aims to provide a fully responsive website that offers detailed product information and showcases the use of modern technologies.
